chapter.title: Getting Started
chapter.para: This section explains how start and how the main window looks like.

note.para: If you have any troubles running CrunchyFrog, make sure that all requirements are met.

section.title: Main Window
section.para: When you start CrunchyFrog, the following window is displayed.

textobject.phrase: Shows CrunchyFrog main window. Contains titlebar, menubar, toolbar, main view and statusbar. The main view contains the navigator and a placeholder for SQL editors. Menubar contains File, Edit, View, Library and Help menus.

section.para: The CrunchyFrog window has the following elements:

listitem.para: The menus on the menubar contain all of the commands you need to work with files in CrunchyFrog.
Plugins can add additionally menus to the menubar.
The toolbar contains a subset of the commands that you can access from the menubar.
The display area has different elements, depending on the activated plugins. By default, the display area contains the database navigator on the left and a placeholder for SQL editors on the right.
The statusbar displays information about current CrunchyFrog activity and contextual information about selected elements.
